pOmics: Tidy Proteomics Data Analysis in R Preface

pOmics: Tidy Proteomics Data Analysis in R Nico HÃ¼ttmann Preface This is my attempt to make proteomics data analysis in R accessible to other scientists. Took me a while to learn it, so why not share it. Main features: data structure for simple loading and handling of data statistical analysis for proteomics data functional enrichment via clusterProfiler tidyverse friendly ggplot2, for publication-quality figures plotly, for interactive data exploration R Markdown, for efficient communication
